snippet.title: Battlefield: Bad Company 2 Onslaught Mode Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Battlefield: Bad Company 2 Onslaught Mode is here! 

Playable with 1-4 players, Onslaught is the first Battlefield console co-op experience where squads capture control points from A.I. enemies in the fastest time possible. 

Onslaught mode is the perfect entry point for newcomers to the Battlefield multiplayer experience as well as a chance for hardcore squad players to prove their skills and compare results with other players across the community via the dedicated Onslaught leaderboards.
